TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MailMessage extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示可以使用 类发送的电子邮件。

span.span: Represents an email message that can be sent using the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的实例用于构造使用 类传输到 SMTP 服务器的电子邮件，以便进行传递。Instances of the class are used to construct email messages that are transmitted to an SMTP server for delivery using the class. 当使用 初始化 对象时，可以将发件人、收件人、主题和电子邮件正文指定为参数。The sender, recipient, subject, and body of an email message may be specified as parameters when a is used to initialize a object. 还可以使用 对象上的属性设置或访问这些参数。These parameters may also be set or accessed using properties on the object. 可以使用 类的以下属性设置消息的主邮件头和元素。The primary mail message headers and elements for the message may be set using the following properties of the class. |邮件头或部分Mail header or part|属性Property| |-------------------------|--------------| |附件Attachments|| |密件抄送（BCC）Blind carbon copies (BCC)|| |抄送（CC）Carbon copies (CC)|| |Content-TypeContent-Type|| |自定义标头编码Encoding for custom headers|| |邮件正文Message body|| |PriorityPriority|| |方Recipient|| |答复Reply-To|| |寄信Sender|| |SubjectSubject|| 通过 类，应用程序还可以使用 属性访问消息的标头集合。The class also allows an application to access the headers collection for the message using the property. 尽管此集合是只读的（无法设置新集合），但可以在此集合中添加或删除自定义标头。While this collection is read-only (a new collection can not be set), custom headers can be added to or deleted from this collection. 发送 实例时，添加的任何自定义标头都将包括在内。Any custom headers added will be included when the instance is sent. 在发送消息之前，集合中只包括专门添加到此集合中 属性的标头。Before a message is sent, only headers specifically added to this collection in the property are included in the collection. 发送 实例后， 属性还将包括使用 类的关联属性设置的标头，或在使用 来初始化 对象时传递的参数。After a the instance is sent, the property will also include headers that are set using the associated properties of the class or parameters passed when a is used to initialize a object. 如果某些邮件头格式不正确，则可能会导致电子邮件损坏。If some mail headers are malformed, they could cause the email message to become corrupted. 因此，可以使用 类上的属性设置的标头集合中的任何邮件头都应使用 类属性设置，或者在 初始化 对象时作为参数传递。So any mail header in the headers collection that can be set using a property on the class should only be set using the class property or as a parameter passed when a initializes a object. 以下邮件头列表不应使用 属性进行添加，并且在发送消息时，将放弃或覆盖使用 属性设置的任何值：The following list of mail headers should not be added using the property and any values set for these headers using the property will be discarded or overwritten when the message is sent: - 密件抄送Bcc - 抄送Cc - 内容-IDContent-ID - Content-LocationContent-Location - Content-Transfer-EncodingContent-Transfer-Encoding - Content-TypeContent-Type - 日期Date - 从From - 重要性Importance - MIME-版本MIME-Version - PriorityPriority - 答复Reply-To - 寄信Sender - 至To - X 优先级X-Priority 如果应用程序未使用 属性指定 X 发送方标头，则在发送消息时， 类将创建一个。If the application does not specify an X-Sender header using the property, the class will create one when the message is sent. 使用 属性指定采用不同格式的电子邮件副本。Use the property to specify copies of an email message in different formats. 例如，如果在 HTML 中发送消息，则可能还需要提供纯文本版本以防某些收件人使用无法显示 HTML 内容的电子邮件读者。For example, if you send a message in HTML, you might also want to provide a plain text version in case some of the recipients use email readers that cannot display HTML content. 有关演示如何使用替代视图创建消息的示例，请参阅 。For an example that demonstrates creating a message with alternate views, see . 使用 属性将附件添加到电子邮件中。Use the property to add attachments to an email message. 有关演示如何使用附件创建消息的示例，请参阅 。For an example that demonstrates creating a message with an attachment, see . 对 Send-mailmessage 调用 Dispose 还会对每个引用的附件调用 Dispose。Calling Dispose on the MailMessage also calls Dispose on each referenced Attachment. 收集电子邮件后，可以使用 或 方法发送电子邮件。After assembling your email message, you can send it by using the or methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和发送包含附件的电子邮件。The following code example demonstrates creating and sending an email message that includes an attachment. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新 对象的属性按如下方式进行初始化：The properties for the new object are initialized as follows: |参数Parameter|属性Property| |---------------|--------------| |`from`|| |`to`|| |`subject`|| |`body`|| 默认情况下，会假定主题和内容使用基于本地计算机设置的默认编码。By default, the subject and content are assumed to use the default encoding based on local computer settings. 使用 "" 和 "" 属性可以指定不同的编码。Use the and properties to specify different encodings. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此构造函数。The following code example demonstrates calling this constructor. summary.span: 获取用于存储邮件正文的替代形式的附件集合。

span.span: Gets the attachment collection used to store alternate forms of the message body.
A writable .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定采用不同格式的电子邮件副本。Use the property to specify copies of an email message in different formats. 例如，如果在 HTML 中发送消息，则可能还需要提供纯文本版本以防某些收件人使用无法显示 HTML 内容的电子邮件读者。For example, if you send a message in HTML, you might also want to provide a plain text version in case some of the recipients use email readers that cannot display HTML content. 若要向 对象添加替代视图，请为视图创建一个 ，然后将其添加到 返回的集合中。To add an alternate view to a object, create an for the view, and then add it to the collection returned by . 使用 属性指定文本版本，并使用 集合来指定具有其他 MIME 类型的视图。Use the property to specify the text version and use the collection to specify views with other MIME types. 使用 类成员为替换视图指定 MIME 类型。Use the class members to specify the MIME type for the alternate view. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用纯文本和 HTML 替代视图创建和发送电子邮件。The following code example demonstrates creating and sending an email message with a plain text and an HTML alternate view. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性返回的集合向此 添加附件，如文件或 的内容。Use the collection returned by the property to add an attachment, such as a file or the contents of a , to this . 创建一个包含或引用要附加的数据的 ，然后将 添加到 返回的集合中。Create an that contains or references the data to be attached, and then add the to the collection returned by . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用附件创建和发送电子邮件。The following code example demonstrates creating and sending an email message with an attachment. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要将 BCC 收件人添加到电子邮件中，请为收件人的地址创建一个 ，然后将该对象添加到 属性返回的集合中。To add a BCC recipient to an email message, create a for the recipient's address, and then add that object to the collection returned by the property. 当收件人查看电子邮件时，通常不会显示 地址。When recipients view an email message, the addresses are usually not displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将地址添加到 地址集合。The following code example demonstrates adding an address to the address collection. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Body { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Body : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置邮件正文。

span.span: Gets or sets the message body.
A value that contains the body text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容的 为 "text/纯文本"。The of the content is "text/plain". 使用 属性指定用于正文的编码。Specify the encoding used for the body with the property. 如果正文内容以为收件人提供更丰富的演示选项的替代格式提供，则可以通过使用 属性指定正文内容的替代视图。If the body content is available in alternative formats that provide richer presentation options for the recipients, you can specify alternate views for the body content by using the property. 例如，应用程序可能选择发送纯文本正文和 HTML 版本的消息正文。For example, an application might choose to send both the plain text body and an HTML version of the message body. 可以显示 HTML 的电子邮件读者可以向收件人显示 HTML 版本的正文，而不能显示 HTML 的读者将改为显示该消息的纯文本版本。Email readers that can display HTML can present the HTML version of the body to the recipient, while readers that cannot display HTML will display the plain text version of the message instead. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 属性。The following code example demonstrates setting the property. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于邮件正文的编码。

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding used to encode the message body.
An applied to the contents of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为 属性指定的值将设置 Content-type 标头中的 "字符集" 字段。The value specified for the property sets the character set field in the Content-Type header. 默认字符集为 `"us-ascii"`。The default character set is `"us-ascii"`. 如果将 属性设置为 、或 ，则框架将为此 选择 。If you set the property to , , or , the Framework selects a of for this . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用 UTF8 编码的邮件。The following code example demonstrates creating a mail message that uses UTF8 encoding. [!code-cpp[NclMailAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclMailASync/cpp/mailasync.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NclMailAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclMailASync/CS/mailasync.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NclMailAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclMailASync/vb/mailasync.vb#3)]

summary.span: 释放 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完 后调用 方法。Call the method when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 后，必须释放对 的所有引用，以便垃圾回收器可以回收 占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何释放 。The following code example demonstrates disposing a .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 使用的非托管资源，并选择性地释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 public `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 `Dispose`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 如果 `disposing` 参数为 true，则此方法将释放此 引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请注意不要引用先前在调用 之前已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks "发件人" 地址未经过验证或绑定到当前登录的用户。The from address is not validated or tied to the currently logged on user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 属性的值。The following code example demonstrates setting a value for the property. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Headers As NameValueCollection

summary.span: 获取与此电子邮件一起传输的电子邮件标头。

span.span: Gets the email headers that are transmitted with this email message.
A that contains the email headers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许应用程序访问消息的标头集合。The property allows an application to access the headers collection for the message. 尽管此集合是只读的（无法设置新集合），但可以在此集合中添加或删除自定义标头。While this collection is read-only (a new collection can not be set), custom headers can be added to or deleted from this collection. 发送 实例时，添加的任何自定义标头都将包括在内。Any custom headers added will be included when the instance is sent. 在发送消息之前，集合中只包括专门添加到此集合中 属性的标头。Before a message is sent, only headers specifically added to this collection in the property are included in the collection. 发送 实例后， 属性还将包括使用 类的关联属性设置的标头，或在使用 来初始化 对象时传递的参数。After the instance is sent, the property will also include headers that are set using the associated properties of the class or parameters passed when a is used to initialize a object. 如果某些邮件头格式不正确，则可能会导致电子邮件损坏。If some mail headers are malformed, they could cause the email message to become corrupted. 因此，可以使用 类上的属性设置的标头集合中的任何邮件头都应使用 类属性设置，或者在 初始化 对象时作为参数传递。So any mail header in the headers collection that can be set using a property on the class should only be set using the class property or as a parameter passed when a initializes a object. 以下邮件头列表不应使用 属性进行添加，并且在发送消息时，将放弃或覆盖使用 属性设置的任何值：The following list of mail headers should not be added using the property and any values set for these headers using the property will be discarded or overwritten when the message is sent: - 密件抄送Bcc - 抄送Cc - 内容-IDContent-ID - Content-LocationContent-Location - Content-Transfer-EncodingContent-Transfer-Encoding - Content-TypeContent-Type - 日期Date - 从From - 重要性Importance - MIME-版本MIME-Version - PriorityPriority - 答复Reply-To - 寄信Sender - 至To - X 优先级X-Priority 如果应用程序未使用 属性指定 X 发送方标头，则在发送消息时， 类将创建一个。If the application does not specify an X-Sender header using the property, the class will create one when the message is sent. 当使用 初始化 对象时，可以将发件人、收件人、主题和电子邮件正文指定为参数。The sender, recipient, subject, and body of an email message may be specified as parameters when a is used to initialize a object. 还可以使用 对象上的属性设置或访问这些参数。These parameters may also be set or accessed using properties on the object. 可以使用 类的以下属性设置消息的主邮件头和元素。The primary mail message headers and elements for the message may be set using the following properties of the class. |邮件头或部分Mail header or part|属性Property| |-------------------------|--------------| |附件Attachments|| |密件抄送（BCC）Blind carbon copies (BCC)|| |抄送（CC）Carbon copies (CC)|| |Content-TypeContent-Type|| |自定义标头编码Encoding for custom headers|| |邮件正文Message body|| |PriorityPriority|| |方Recipient|| |答复Reply-To|| |寄信Sender|| |SubjectSubject|| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示邮件的标头。The following code example demonstrates displaying the headers for a mail message. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#24](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#24)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#24)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Text::Encoding ^ HeadersEncoding { System::Text::Encoding ^ get(); void set(System::Text::Encoding ^ value); };
member this.HeadersEncoding : System.Text.Encoding with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置此电子邮件的用户自定义标头使用的编码。

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding used for the user-defined custom headers for this email message.

value.span: 此电子邮件的用户定义自定义标头使用的编码。

span.span: The encoding used for user-defined custom headers for this email message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的值默认为 。The value of the property defaults to . SMTP 消息由标头和正文部分组成。SMTP messages consist of headers and body parts. 适用于 SMTP 的 IETF Rfc 会将标头和正文部分的名称限制为 ASCII。The IETF RFCs for SMTP restrict the header and body part names to be ASCII. 但 IETF Rfc 允许标头和正文部分值包含 Unicode 字符。However, the IETF RFCs allow header and body part values to contain Unicode characters. 在任何特定值中，如果存在非 ASCII 字符，则使用字符编码（例如 UTF8 或 Shift-jis）的组合（例如，）后跟字节编码（例如 或 ）对值进行编码。In any particular value, if non-ASCII characters exist, then the value is encoded using a combination of character encoding (UTF8 or Shift-JIS, for example) followed by byte encoding ( or for example). 结果通常是网络传输流中只有 ASCII 字符。The result is usually that only ASCII characters are in the network transmission stream.

summary.span: 获取或设置邮件的回复地址。

span.span: Gets or sets the ReplyTo address for the mail message.
A MailAddress that indicates the value of the field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指示要用于回复此邮件的 地址以外的地址。Use the property to indicate an address other than the address to use to reply to this message.

span.span: The list of the addresses to reply to for the mail message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指示要用于回复此邮件的地址列表，而不是 地址。Use the property to indicate the list of addresses other than the address to use to reply to this message. 属性替换仅允许单个地址回复的 属性。The property replaces the property that only allows a single address to reply to.

summary.span: 获取包含此电子邮件收件人的地址集合。

A writable object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于指定电子邮件的 "到" 行中的地址。The property is used to designate the addresses on the To line of an email message. 若要将收件人添加到电子邮件中，请为收件人的地址创建一个 ，然后将该对象添加到此属性所返回的集合中。To add a recipient to an email message, create a for the recipient's address, and then add that object to the collection returned by this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 属性。The following code example demonstrates setting the property.
